name: io::buffered::bufreader::buffer::Buffer::consume_with

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 992, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 993, kind: RigidTy(Slice(Ty { id: 35, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U8)) })) }, Not)) })])

doc:
If there are `amt` bytes available in the buffer, pass a slice containing those bytes to
 `visitor` and return true. If there are not enough bytes available, return false.
